p: Methylation analysis of PD1-1 was conducted according to a previously reported method [ 39]. Briefly, PD1-1 was dissolved in anhydrous dimethyl sulfoxide (DMSO; 1 mL), and solid NaOH was added to the solution under a nitrogen atmosphere. The sample was then methylated with CH 3I, and the permethylated sample was hydrolyzed with 2 mol/L TFA at 121 °C for 1.5 h. After reduction and acetylation of the hydrolysates, the sample was analyzed by GC–MS using an RXI-5 SIL MS column.
